database_servers

Class CacheServicesThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • database_servers.CacheServicesThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Remote, ListL2Manager

    public class CacheServicesThread
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements ListL2Manager
    CacheServicesThread class: it manages requests from cache servers or proxies. In the first case the only allowed request is the registration in the ip_cache table because the server is online; on the other hand when the request comes from a proxy, it receives the list of active cache servers, retrieved from the ip_cache table. All the requests and the responses are handled by appropriate protocols.
    Author:
    Andrea Bugin and Ilie Sarpe
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
